Key Arguments: Freedom of speech is essential to democracy.
Individuals should be able to use critical thinking and research to form their own conclusions.
The proposed legislation is likened to Orwellian control over information.
Personal experience with vaccine adverse reactions is used to argue against the suppression of certain viewpoints.
Notable Quotes: Freedom of speech is a fundamental pillar of democracy.
We don't need George Orwell's ministry of truth confabulating dis-information and mis-information.
In a democracy we can use our critical thinking and research to reach our own conclusions.
